Description: Clay coin mould for forging nummi. In the form of a disc with five coin impressions either side (for stacking before introduction of molten metal).
State: Associated with: Roman Empire Ancient Greece and Rome: Roman Empire
Condition: Sept. 2009: Alcohol swab sample taken with Keeper's permission by Dr B. Lichocka (Polish Academy, Warsaw)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Rev Greville John Chester
